creator: Digitalmoka
descriptionHtml:
Solitaire Classic is the NEW FREE Klondike Solitaire 2020 (or Patience Solitaire) with a set of unique and incredible features never seen before. Not just the Classic Solitaire, it’s MUCH MORE!

🎲 GAMEPLAY OPTIONS
Try different ways to solve this amazing free Solitaire:
♠️ SINGLE PLAYER: the more classical way to play draw 1 or 3 cards Solitaire game.
♠️ MULTIPLAYER ONLINE: compete against other players from all over the world.
♠️ DAILY CHALLENGE: collect all your victories month by month and earn your prizes.

📡 OFFLINE GAMEPLAY
If you lost your connection no problem! You can continue to play Solitaire Classic as well.

🌈 GRAPHIC CUSTOMIZATION
We don’t want it’s just a Solitaire, we want it’s YOUR Solitaire!
Discover the incredible number of themes, colors combinations, static and animated table backgrounds, card decks and much more to create your own unique game experience.

🤖 ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
Solitaire Classic learns your skills and provides you the most appropriate level of difficulty with a cards combination that is winnable but challenging.
The more you improve your ability, the more Solitaire Classic challenges your skills.
In Solitaire Classic you can find more than 20 MILLION cards combinations ALL WINNABLE, because the game can be hard but you always deserve your chance to win!

😍 EASY TO USE
Everything you want to do in Solitaire Classic is easy, fast and free, you don’t need any guide or help, everything is clear and simple.

🏆 COUNTRY LEADERBOARDS
Win the matches, gain points and help your country to scale the leaderboards to reach for the top of Solitaire Classic!

♥️ No registration required
♥️ Portrait mode
♥️ Landscape mode
♥️ Tablet optimization
♥️ Draw 1 or 3 cards game
♥️ All winnable cards combinations
♥️ Statistics
♥️ Auto complete for solved games
♥️ Set the animation speed
♥️ Left-handed mode

⭐⭐⭐ TRY Solitaire Classic for FREE! ⭐⭐⭐

Check out the other amazing games by Digitalmoka:
The Italian game of Scopa
The Italian game of Briscola
The Italian game of Asso Piglia Tutto
Many other games will be available very soon : Buraco, Italian Tressette, Italian Scopone Scientifico, Bingo, Checkers, Four in a Row and many more.

More about Digitalmoka at www.digitalmoka.com
Follow us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/digitalmoka

title: Solitaire Classic

creator: Digitalmoka
descriptionHtml:
Solitaire Classic is the NEW FREE Klondike Solitaire 2021 (or Patience Solitaire) with a set of unique and incredible features never seen before. Not just the Classic Solitaire, it’s MUCH MORE!

🎲 GAMEPLAY OPTIONS
Try different ways to solve this amazing free Solitaire:
♠️ SINGLE PLAYER: the more classical way to play draw 1 or 3 cards Solitaire game.
♠️ MULTIPLAYER ONLINE: compete against other players from all over the world.
♠️ DAILY CHALLENGE: collect all your victories month by month and earn your prizes.

📡 OFFLINE GAMEPLAY
If you lost your connection no problem! You can continue to play Solitaire Classic as well.

🌈 GRAPHIC CUSTOMIZATION
We don’t want it’s just a Solitaire, we want it’s YOUR Solitaire!
Discover the incredible number of themes, colors combinations, static and animated table backgrounds, card decks and much more to create your own unique game experience.

🤖 ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
Solitaire Classic learns your skills and provides you the most appropriate level of difficulty with a cards combination that is winnable but challenging.
The more you improve your ability, the more Solitaire Classic challenges your skills.
In Solitaire Classic you can find more than 20 MILLION cards combinations ALL WINNABLE, because the game can be hard but you always deserve your chance to win!

😍 EASY TO USE
Everything you want to do in Solitaire Classic is easy, fast and free, you don’t need any guide or help, everything is clear and simple.

🏆 COUNTRY LEADERBOARDS
Win the matches, gain points and help your country to scale the leaderboards to reach for the top of Solitaire Classic!

♥️ No registration required
♥️ Portrait mode
♥️ Landscape mode
♥️ Tablet optimization
♥️ Draw 1 or 3 cards game
♥️ All winnable cards combinations
♥️ Statistics
♥️ Auto complete for solved games
♥️ Set the animation speed
♥️ Left-handed mode

⭐⭐⭐ TRY Solitaire Classic for FREE! ⭐⭐⭐

Check out the other amazing games by Digitalmoka:

The Italian game of Briscola
The Italian game of Asso Piglia Tutto
